question: 朝ご飯
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>晩ご飯</ja> is "dinner"? Well, that word is so 12 hours ago. This is morning and in the <kanji>morning</kanji> your <kanji>meal</kanji> is <vocabulary>breakfast</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are the ones you learned with the kanji. It's also like the vocab: <ja>朝</ja> is like the vocab version, <ja>あさ</ja> and <ja>ご飯</ja> is like the word you learned, <ja>ごはん</ja>.
